knimeNode.name: Run R Model in Microsoft SQL Server
knimeNode.shortDescription: Run R code with a pre-trained R model on a Microsoft SQL Server in a database.

fullDescription.intro:
This node allows running R code on a Microsoft SQL Server (using a SQL query behind the scenes). Input and output data to the R script are SQL tables. In addition the knime.model (cannot be NULL, or will not be transfered to R otherwise) and knime.flow.in variables from a R port can be used in the R script.
To output data from the R script to the output SQL table, assign a R data.frame to knime.out.
JDBC Driver
This node requires the Microsoft JDBC driver to be used in the Microsoft SQL Server connector. You can install the driver extension from the KNIME Update Site (KNIME Microsoft JDBC Driver For SQL Server).
